text: Arnold Chan (June 10, 1967 – September 14, 2017) was a Canadian lawyer and politician. He was elected to represent the riding of Scarborough—Agincourt in the House of Commons of Canada in the 2014 by-election. Chan was a member of the Liberal Party of Canada. Chan died on September 14, 2017 in Scarborough, Ontario of nasopharynx cancer at the age of 50. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1967 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Canadian lawyers Category:Deaths from nasopharynx cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Canada Category:Politicians from Toronto Category:Members of the House of Commons of Canada from Ontario
title: Arnold Chan
